Config

Sequence length of 1024 is used in the paper and training for 150 k iterations.

{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Example command to run full scale experiment

run_exp 'synt' \ --attn_dropout=0.0 \ --ff_dropout=0.0 \ --emb_dropout=0.0 \ --d_ff=256 \ --d_model=256 \ --n_layers=1 \ --bucket_size=64 \ --bs=128 \ --sl=1024 \ --train_sz=19200000 \ --valid_sz=10000 \ --seed=123 \ --wandb_group='Synthetic' \ --wandb_tags='synthetic_task lsh lm test' \ --wandb_name='synth_lsh_1_hash' \ --use_lsh=True \ --n_hashes=1

run_exp[source]

run_exp(task:"Task options: 'synt','lm_base','lm_rev',lm_shared_qk, trans", data_path:"Path to data folder", n_epochs:"Number of epochs", lr:"Learning rate", bs:"Batch size", sl:"Seqlence length", do_wandb_logging:"Use weights and biases logging", wandb_name:"wandb run name", wandb_group:"wandb group", wandb_notes:"wandb notes", wandb_tags:"wandb tags, add tags in a single string, space separated", save_model:"Save model locally in /models", cuda_id:"Which cuda device to use", seed:"Set seed for reproducibiltiy, passing anything except 0 will use fastai's set_seed")

Task options: 'synt','lm_base','lm_rev',lm_shared_qk, trans
